2.「キサマが どうぐ使いとして| どこまで成長したか 見たくなったのだ。| ちょっ: I just wanted to see how far Kisama had come|as a tool user... Just a little...

3.「とにかく 天才魔道学者である ワガハイが| 直々に 特訓をつけてやるのだから|: Anyway, the genius wizard Wagahai will|personally give you a special training, so be|thankful! Hahahaha!

4.「よし。では 始めるとしよう。| まずは マスターキーを………: All right. Let's get started... First, I need|the master key.

7.「ぬぬぬぬ……。| キサマは 地上制圧隊の偵察兵か？| こんなにも早く 見つかっ: No, no, no... Are you a reconnaissance|soldier for the ground control team? I didn't|think they'd find us so soon...

8.「言わなくとも わかっておるぞ。| ワガハイを 魔界に連れ戻す気だろう？: I don't have to tell you... You're going to|bring Wagahai back to the demon world, aren't|you?

9.「その通りだ。我々に 逆らったら| どうなるかは キサマも知っているはずだ。|: Well... Kisama knows what will happen if he|crosses us. Now, why don't you come with me|back to the demon world?

11.「なに……？ キサマ 今 なんと言った？: What...? Kisama, what did you just say?

12.「ふははは！ ノーと 言ったのだ！| 天才であるワガハイは 誰にも束縛されん！|: Ha-ha-ha! I said no! As a genius, Wagahai is|unbound by anyone! There's no way I'm going|back to the demon world!

13.「研究員の分際で いい気になりおって！| ならば チカラずくで 連れ戻すまでだ！: You're just a researcher with a big heart!|Then I'll do everything in my power to bring|her back!

14.「ふははは！ キサマら偵察兵ごとき| この ワガハイが 相手をするまでもないわ！: Ha-ha-ha! I don't need to deal with you|scouts, you waggahai!

16.「せっかく 逃げおおせたのに| また ここに戻ってくるとは おろかだな！| デル: After all we've been through to get away,|you'd be foolish to come back here!|Researcher Delclois!

17.「ぬぬぬ……。まだ この辺りにいたとは| ワガハイとしたことが ぬかったわ。|: Oh, no... I didn't know you were still around|here... We're completely surrounded...

18.「ふははは！ よいところに来た 原住民よ！| 特訓は ひとまず おあずけにしてや: Ha-ha-ha! You've come to the right place,|natives! I'll put off the training for now!|For now, let's just focus on defeating them!

20.「ま まさか 地上制圧隊の偵察兵を| 倒してしまうとは……。: I didn't think we'd be able to defeat the|ground control scouts...

21.「ふははは！ ワガハイが生み出した| どうぐ使いなら 勝って当然と言えよう！: Ha-ha-ha! A potion wielder created by the|Wagahai deserves to win!

22.「まあ この戦いで キサマの実力の程は| よくわかったからな。| 今回の特訓は: Well, this battle has given me a good idea of|what you're capable of. I think I'll stop|training this time.

23.「アストルティアのサルが| 魔物を 従えているとはな……。: I didn't know that the monkeys of Astrutia|had demons in their midst.

24.「どうぐ使い <cs_pchero>！| キサマの名前は 覚えたぞ！: tool user<cs_pchero>I know your name! I know your name!

25.「デルクロア研究員よ 覚悟しておけ！| アストルティアのサルと 組んでいることを: Researcher Delcroix, prepare yourselves! I'll|be sure to inform the main army that you've|teamed up with an Astruthian monkey!

26.「ぬぬぬぬ……。なんてことだ。| 生き残りがいたとは 気づかなかった……。: No, no, no... Oh my... I didn't realize there|were survivors...

27.「ああ……いったい どうすれば……。| まずい まずい まずい……。| このまま: Oh, my God. I don't know what to do. No, no,|no, no, no, no, no, no, no. If we don't do|something, he's gonna come...

28.「ふ……ふははは！ 何を見ておる！| これぐらいは 計算通りである！| 奴が 報: Huh... Ha-ha-ha! What are you looking at!|This is exactly what I calculated! I knew|he'd report in!

29.「さあ！ ボケっと 突っ立っておるでない！| ワガハイの研究室に戻るぞ！ 原住民: Come on! Don't just stand there! We're going|back to the Wagahai lab! Natives!

30.「ふははは！ どうやら ワガハイの過去が| 気になって 気になって 仕方ないよう: Ha-ha-ha! Looks like you're all curious about|the past of the Wagahai! All right, let's|hear it!

31.「魔界にいた頃のワガハイは さる大貴族に| 飼われている 地上制圧隊の指揮下にあ:
When I was in the demon world, I was in a|research and development lab under the|command of a ground control unit kept by a|
|great nobleman...

32.「その 研究開発室での仕事というのは| チカラだけが取り柄の 地上制圧隊の魔物を: My job in the R&D lab was to enhance the|demons of the ground control team whose only|asset was their strength...

33.「だが 最初から強い魔物を 強くするなど……| そんな研究が おもしろかろうハズ: But to make a demon stronger than it already|is... I don't see how such research could be|interesting.

34.「ワガハイは 自分の好きな研究に没頭するため| 魔界に見切りをつけ アストルティ: Wagahay has given up on the demon world and|has come to Astrutia to pursue his favorite|research. Well, you know...

35.「アストルティアの原住民に| ワガハイが 過去のことを話すなど| 滅多に ないの: It's not every day a Wagahai tells the|natives of Astrutia about his past, is it?|Thank you...

36.「……偵察兵を 取り逃がしたとなると | 遠からず 地上制圧隊 本隊からの追っ手: ... If we've missed the scouts, the ground|troops from the main army will be on our|world before long.

37.「きっと その追っ手を <pc>さんに| 追い払ってもらうため ご主人さまは|: I'm sure they'll be after you<pc> I think your husband decided to tell you|about his past to get rid of you...

38.「いつ 追っ手が来てもいいように修行して| 準備ができたら また どうぐ使いにな:
I want you to train yourself so that you'll|be ready when your pursuers arrive, and when|you're ready, I want you to come back here|
|and become a tool user...
